name: unmistakably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is very easy to see and not likely to be confused with something else: The discussions are unmistakably going in the wrong direction. She had an air of chic that was unmistakably French. See
unmistakable
More examplesFewer examplesYou could tell from looking at her that she was unmistakably the girl's mother.He found what was unmistakably a large fossil.Her mission was unmistakably clear.
